mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_SCHEDULE (INSTRUMENT_CD, PAY_RCV_CD, COUPON_STRT_DT, COUPON_RESET_DT, COUPON_END_DT, COUPON_PAY_DT, COUPON_TYPE, PRINCIPAL, UPPERBOUND1, LOWERBOUND1, LEVERAGE1, UPPERBOUND2, LOWERBOUND2, LEVERAGE2, LEVERAGE3, INCOUPON, OUTCOUPON, FIXED_COUPON, CAP, FLOOR) VALUES ( #{instrumentCd}, #{payRcvCd}, #{startDate}, #{couponResetDt}, #{endDate}, #{paymentDate}, #{CouponType}, #{principal}, #{UpperLimit1}, #{LowerLimit1}, #{Leverage1}, #{UpperLimit2}, #{LowerLimit2}, #{Leverage2}, #{Leverage3}, #{InCouponRate}, #{OutCouponRate}, #{Spread}, #{cap}, #{floor} );
